title: bajarE sreeraamam
sahitya:
bhajarE shrIrAmam hE mAnasa bhajarE raghurAmam





caraNam 1



 bhaja raghurAmam bhaNDana bhImam rajanicaraukavi rAmam rAmam

   



caraNam 2



 vanaruha nayanam kanadahi shayanam manasija kOTi samAnam mAnam

   



caraNam 3



  tAraka nAmam dasharatha rAmam cAru bhadrAdri sancAram dhIram

   



caraNam 4



  sItArAmam cinmaya dAmam shrI tulasIdaLa shrIkara dAmam

   



caraNam 5



 shyAmaLa gAtram satya caritram rAmadAsa hrd-rAjIva mitram
